Why should we study the concepts of programming languages? 
 
	• It increases the ability to express ideas 
	• So we can choose the most appropriate language for the job 
	• Learn new languages easily! 
	• Better understanding of significance of implementation 
	• Better use of languages that you already know 
	• Overall, get good at computing!

There are criteria for evaluating a programming language : 
 
	• Readability: the ease of which programs can be read and understood 
	• Writability: the ease of which a language can be used to create programs 
	• Reliability: performance, based on its specifications 
	• Cost: the ultimate total cost
